title: e-MFP
subtitle: Options for #refugees are: waiting, voluntary repatriation, refugee hiss status in 2nd country, resettlement in 3rd country (less than 1%). Economic inclusion is key as they stay 5yrs or more in 1 situation. #emw2019pic.twitter.com/vTRtls3GWY

title: UNHCR KENYA
